description: KeeAutoExec This plugin allows to automatically open additional databases when opening a database.

installer.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Copy-Item "$dir\KeeAutoExec*" "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\"; KeePass

uninstaller.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Get-Item "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\KeeAutoExec*" | Remove-Item -Force; KeePass
